implement Neumann and Dirichlet as special cases of RobinBC
specialized constructors for Neumann0 and Dirichlet0
other acceptable argument signatures RobinBC(al::T, bl::T, cl::T, dx_l::T, ar::T, br::T, cr::T, dx_r::T, order = 1) where T = RobinBC([al,bl, cl], [ar, br, cr], dx_l, order)
